reviews.title: A terrific bargain
reviews.text: This small (4 rooms) B&B is amazing. 1) It's on a cul-de-sac, so there's no traffic noise. 2) You're a 5-block walk from the middle of downtown Anchorage. 3) The rooms are recently remodeled and immaculately clean. 4) The bed was very, very comfortable. 5) Breakfast was plentiful and delicious. 6) The owners were inviting, friendly, and knowledgeable about Alaska. 7) It was only $95 per night (in high season!). What more could you ask for?
